document.full_text: as floodwaters have surged across the central united states over the past month, the names of the towns in danger have changed: grand forks, north dakota; cairo, illinois; memphis, tennessee.
document.title: taming floods a familiar, contentious job for army corps
lines_and_colors: as floodwaters have surged across the central united states over the past month, the names of the towns in danger have changed: grand forks, north dakota; cairo, illinois; memphis, tennessee.
